mapper.update: UPDATE teacher SET t_img=#{t_img}, t_name=#{t_name}, t_account_owner=#{t_account_owner}, t_account_number=#{t_account_number}, t_account_bank=#{t_account_bank}, t_profile=#{t_profile} WHERE t_idx=#{t_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( select ROWNUM AS RNUM, C.* from ( SELECT b.*, u.u_name FROM users u, (SELECT r.*, a.lesson_time, a.lesson_subj FROM lesson_record r, (SELECT l.lesson_subj, s.lesson_time, s.lesson_schedule_idx FROM lesson_list l, lesson_schedule s WHERE l.t_idx=#{t_idx} and l.lesson_idx=s.lesson_idx) a WHERE a.lesson_schedule_idx=r.lesson_schedule_idx) b WHERE u.u_idx=b.u_idx )c)d WHERE RNUM>=#{start} AND RNUM<=#{end}
mapper.update: UPDATE ( SELECT u.u_idx, u.u_name, u.u_point, t.t_idx, t.t_name, t.t_point FROM users u, teacher t WHERE u.u_idx = t.u_idx and t_idx=#{t_idx}) a SET a.u_point=a.u_point+#{exPoint}
UPDATE ( SELECT u.u_idx, u.u_name, u.u_point, t.t_idx, t.t_name, t.t_point FROM users u, teacher t WHERE u.u_idx = t.u_idx and t_idx=#{t_idx}) a SET a.t_point=a.t_point-#{exPoint}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pay_list VALUES( seq_pay_list.nextval, (SELECT u.u_idx FROM users u, teacher t WHERE u.u_idx = t.t_idx AND t.t_idx=#{t_idx}), '환전', '포인트', sysdate, #{exPoint} )
